publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-656 Mrs Margaret Smith on behalf of the Health and Community Care Committee: Health Boards and NHS Trusts: Public Consultation—That the Parliament notes the concerns of the Health and Community Care Committee, in relation to the accountability of health boards and NHS Trusts and notes the need for a new approach to public consultation as illustrated in the recent and ongoing work of the Committee, and in this connection the Parliament notes the 9th Report, 1999 by the Committee, Report on Stracathro Petition PE13 (SP Paper 48).
